name: Lamar Roasts Franklin: Definitive Edition
description: Ignore the other versions of Lamar Roasts Franklin, and Get your hands on the One True version Above all Others.  In Lamar Roasts Franklin: Definitive Edition, You can Control how this short scenario Unfolds.  Whether Franklin Gets Roasted or not is Entirely up to You, The Player.  In This game there are 3 Separate Endings, a Good, A bad,  and a Neutral.  Can You Get them all? Probably, It's a Really Short game.
